summary: This mod adds a new Ohmes follower named Zev'raan to the Ragged Flaggon
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a new marriageable male Ohmes follower named Zev'raan to the Ragged Flagon in Riften. His appearance is inspired by Zevran Arainai from Dragon Age: Origins.

If you want a background for him, he is a thief and assassin from Elsweyr. He joined the Thieves Guild because the Dark Brotherhood was too cultish for him.

The Ohmes are a breed of Khajiit who appear like Bosmer with tattooed faces.

Doesn't require any mods.Â 

Credits:
Me - Everything

Use the face tattoo detail map for whatever you want.
author: GendunDrup
